title: Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Revelstoke, British Columbia
content:
Photo taken and submitted by Furio Sorrentino of rider Amelia Sorrentino, “After 7 weeks of dense wildfire smoke covering the region last summer, we lucked out and hit Revelstoke’s Frisby Ridge a day after it cleared.” We always love seeing photos from where you are riding and are happy to share them with our readers around the

The post Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Revelstoke, British Columbia appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Kristi Benedict
